title: Rescue the Tieflings
content:

[DECEPTION] Would you look at that- my map's upside down. I should have turned right at that crossroads. [INTIMIDATION] Let me be, or you won't live to regret it. [PERSUASION] Haven't you ever been turned around on your way to a date with destiny?

Another option is to fight The Warden since this area is unseen from the level above. Make sure to destroy the Scrying Eye in this area so that the others will not be alerted. Aft
